content.raw:
Any progress on this? I'm also trying to use the PR2 simulator, but gzserver always segfaults. btw, this happens in ROS groovy with both the old gazebo (1.5, I think) and the new one from osrf (1.9.1).

btw, the segfaults only occur on an 8-core server box with an NVidia GT8800 installed. When I run the same stuff on my Laptop (4 cores, Intel HD4000), it works, albeit slowly.
content.html:
Any progress on this? I'm also trying to use the PR2 simulator, but gzserver always segfaults. btw, this happens in ROS groovy with both the old gazebo (1.5, I think) and the new one from osrf (1.9.1).

btw, the segfaults only occur on an 8-core server box with an NVidia GT8800 installed. When I run the same stuff on my Laptop (4 cores, Intel HD4000), it works, albeit slowly.
